channel.title: [IRC Client]NewbIRC
channel.description:
got bored, and made this, it's still in BETA! no notification when users join/leave/quit (they'll even stay in the users list atm.) there's a nice little startup wizard first time you run it
it's opensource! it's skinnable!
here's a screeny of my least favourite skin: [url=http://www.newbiehacker.org/BETA.png][img]http://www.newbiehacker.org/BETA.png[/img][/url]
here's he crappy skin I had loaded: [code] #Created by newbiehacker, feel free to make your own skins! author=newbiehacker name=Blue Skin v1 background-color=128 128 255 text-color=0 0 128 event-text-color=128 128 128 text-size=10 text-font=Tahoma timestamp=[hh:mm:ss] userstamp=^[^$nick^]^
channel=default/channel.png channel-new-message=default/channelnew.png channel-event=default/channelevent.png
server=default/server.png server-new=default/servernew.png [/code] NOTE: event-text-color currently does nothing, but it will in the future!, be warned
EDIT: Download here: [url=http://www.newbiehacker.org/NewbIRC.zip]http://www.newbiehacker.org/NewbIRC-BETA.zip[/url]

item.title: [IRC Client]NewbIRC
item.dc:creator: @newbiehacker newbiehacker
item.description:
@newbiehacker wrote:

it's no-where near complete (this version anyway) the one I have atm has some more functions and parses all colours correctly

EDIT:
locked, I'll make a new thread when I'm finished

item.title: [IRC Client]NewbIRC
item.dc:creator: @newbiehacker newbiehacker
item.description:
@newbiehacker wrote:

got bored, and made this, it's still in BETA!
no notification when users join/leave/quit (they'll even stay in the users list atm.)
there's a nice little startup wizard first time you run it

it's opensource!
it's skinnable!

here's a screeny of my least favourite skin:

here's he crappy skin I had loaded:

#Created by newbiehacker, feel free to make your own skins!
author=newbiehacker
name=Blue Skin v1
background-color=128 128 255
text-color=0 0 128
event-text-color=128 128 128
text-size=10
text-font=Tahoma
timestamp=[hh:mm:ss]
userstamp=^[^$nick^]^
channel=default/channel.png
channel-new-message=default/channelnew.png
channel-event=default/channelevent.png
server=default/server.png
server-new=default/servernew.png

NOTE: event-text-color currently does nothing, but it will in the future!, be warned

EDIT:
Download here: http://www.newbiehacker.org/NewbIRC-BETA.zip

Read full topic
